_sText:
RACE_SEWERS BY UNREAL So, I wanted to make a "new" map, one slighly diferent from all the other race maps out there, so I took some inspiration from games like TonyHawks using sewers as half-pipes to make awesome maneuvers, and this is the final result. Also, consider this map a bump on this mod, hopefully there will be more race maps soon to keep this mod alive. About the map, its a pretty little map, 2 laps with a nice view under some city with a nicely scaled 3DSkybox, it has a few bridges over it and some obstacles, to make it look more urban style.
Other race maps I made RACE_GRANDTOUR RACE_UNDERGROUND RACE_COMPETITION RACE_TEXURECITY RACE_DESERTROCK (REMAKE)
I hope you like this map, I made it specially for this ocasion, hopefully more people will make more race maps.
FRAGXL.com Rally RaceMania - 80.172.230.146:27095 The finnest RallyRace available server at the moment, the mod that Natalya was fixing wasn't finished so our community scripters fixed it themselves, so we are probably the only community running the mod 100% working, with custom cars and stuff. Join and enjoy.
Have fun!
